name: css-font-weight
description: Css module of single purpose classes for font weight

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-font-weight.css > css/css-font-weight.css && tachyons src/css-font-weight.css --minify > css/css-font-weight.min.css && tachyons src/css-font-weight.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
